guidelines.title: Guidelines
guidelines.step_content_1: Select a timeframe to display aggregated insurance contract (IC) data for that period.
guidelines.step_content_2: Please click here to view and monitor your IC.
guidelines.step_title_3: Press 'tutorial' if you are having trouble using Nami Insurance.
guidelines.step_content_3: Hasd ID is a unique code for each Insurance Contract. Copy the code and send it to customer service team when you need help.
guidelines.step_content_4: Follow the status of your insurance policy here. See detailed descriptions for all states in {{value}}.
guidelines.step_content_5: Review the tutorial or learn more about {{value}} if you are having trouble using it.
